snippet.title: Revolution (PC 2002) - Full Game Walkthrough - No Commentary
snippet.description:
If you enjoyed watching this video, please leave a like and subscribe! I would very much appreciate it!

Decided to put my videos together. It's not the best possible quality but since I did this like 5 years ago, I guess it's okay!

2002 Activision Value Publishing, Inc. All rights reserved. Revolution is a trademark of Activision Value Publishing, Inc. Activision is a registered trademark of Activision Publishing. Inc. GameSpy and the 'Powered by GameSpy' design are trademarks of GameSpy Industries, Inc. All rights reserved. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners. All rights reserved. Distributed under license by Empire Interactive Europe Limited on Xplosiv. Xplosiv is a registered or unregistered trademark of Empire Interactive Europe Limited in the UK and/or other countries. All rights reserved.

This game has been developed by FUNLabs and was published by Activision, back in 2002. The game was very underrated due to its constant confusions and bugs. That also caused people to get frustrated very often. Based on 10 ratings, it scored a 2.9 out of 10.

Revolution (2002) playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYwqV0N4djf96bhZjSn77cwcAHD7cXWap

Story:

Revolution; The evolution of mankind is in your hands!
The environment has been ravaged. The planet is wounded and wasting away. In order for humanity to continue, our bodies have been modified to enhance strengths and minimize weaknesses. Have we gone too far?

You begin as a maintenance worker for the corporation, The Centre of Hope and Power. As you explore and uncover more about your employer, you discover the 'New Breed' program designed to advance the species. But with every enhancement comes a cost and the question becomes: Will you use technology or will it use you?

The Resistance, an underground movement that wants you preserve the human race in its purest form, contacts you. They entice you to join them in their fight to preserve the species; however, the corporation has other plans for you.
As the first 'New Breed' you are truly powerful, but what have you really become? Are you still human? Will you support the corporation or join the resistance?

Release Date - October 21, 2002
Genre - First-Person Shooter
Platforms - Windows
Publisher - Activision Value
Developer - FUN Labs

My Xbox360 gamertag: Shad0wx54x

Wanna see more of my fantastic walkthroughs? Give it a go: https://www.youtube.com/user/ToughGamingGuy/playlists
